texts.Welcome_Text: This is a minimalist, single layer application startup template for the ABP Framework.
texts.UseGoogleAuthenticator: Please use Google/Microsoft Authenticator to scan the following QR Code:
texts.UserLockedOutMessage: The user account has been locked out due to invalid login attempts. Please wait a while and try again.
texts.UserLogoutOrSessionExpired: The user has logged out or the session has expired
